name: Caveopolis
description: Made for 7dfps 2022. Explore a vast cave of tunnels and caverns to mine resources. Use dynamite to clear blocked tunnels, run along wooden walls, and use a grapple hook to soar through the air! Only 3 of the 7 objectives need to be completed in order to win. There are no enemies to worry about, but there are environmental hazards so watch out!
